alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/... At 753 PM EDT/653 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eglin Air Force Base to 9 miles west of Vernon. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ebro, Portland, Southport, Villa Tasso, Seminole Hills, Blue Mountain Beach, Rock Hill, Millers Ferry, Gulf Pines, Knox Hill, Bunker, Vicksburg, Grayton Beach, Sandestin, Four Mile Village and Bayhead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
